item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality. Wake Up and Live!" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else's opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants and murderers, and for a time, they can seem invincible, but in the end, they always fall. Think of it--always." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "I have a dream that one day little black boys and girls will be holding hands with little white boys and girls." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "We are visitors on this planet. We are here for one hundred years at the very most. During that period we must try to do something good, something useful, with our lives. if you contribute to other people's happiness, you will find the true meaning of life." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "All evil is good become cancerous." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by William Arthur Ward
item.description: "Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you." -- William Arthur Ward

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Silence is sometimes the best answer" -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Fashion is a form of ugliness so intolerable that we have to alter it every six months." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Pardon My Sanity In A World Insane" -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "Know the rules well, so you can break them effectively." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "If a problem is fixable, if a situation is such that you can do something about it, then there is no need to worry. If it's not fixable, then there is no help in worrying. There is no benefit in worrying whatsoever." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "People should fall in love with their eyes closed." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "There is a saying in Tibetan, 'Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.' No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "The creatures that inhabit this earth--be they human beings or animals--are here to contribute, each in its own particular way, to the beauty and prosperity of the world." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by H.L. Mencken
item.description: "Happiness is the china shop; love is the bull." -- H.L. Mencken

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami

item.title: Kasandra add a quote by Benjamin Hoff
item.description: "Lots of people talk to animals...Not very many listen though...that's the problem." -- Benjamin Hoff
